description: This file is a Python script demonstrating how to use WhatsApp integration with the Agno framework. It includes setup instructions, imports necessary modules, creates an Agent with a Gemini model and WhatsAppTools, and shows an example of sending a template message.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with models and tools.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response message from the agent.
